data.actual_result: Emoji sometimes appear as if they overlap or misshapen (easy to see when the client previews the 😡 emoji)
data.expected_result: The emojis appear as circles no matter what emoji is previewed for the toggle
data.short_description: Hovering over the emoji picker UI toggle sometimes are misshapen at any zoom other than default
data.steps_to_repro: - Ctrl+R to recieve the new UI update - Set the zoom level to any non-default- hover over the emoji picker - note that certain emoji are overlapping
